biotools.summary: Juicer is a platform for analyzing kilobase resolution Hi-C data. In this distribution, we include the pipeline for generating Hi-C maps from fastq raw data files and command line tools for feature annotation on the Hi-C maps.

bioschemas.name: Juicer
bioschemas.summary: Juicer is a platform for analyzing kilobase resolution Hi-C data. In this distribution, we include the pipeline for generating Hi-C maps from fastq raw data files and command line tools for feature annotation on the Hi-C maps.
